wikipedia_page.main: Barbara Mary Cameron  (born 16 April 1962) is a former Northern Irish lawn bowler and bowls coach.

link_mentions.page: 2000 World Outdoor Bowls Championship – Women's pairs

response: In 1993, she won the pairs gold medal with Barbara Cameron at the inaugural Atlantic Bowls Championships. She went on to win three more medals at the Championships.
